0.name: AI Prediction Core
0.description: Central intelligence, makes predictions about short-term price movements for 0DTE options trading.

1.name: Ultra High-Frequency Data Processor
1.description: Processes high-frequency market data, order book data, and alternative data for the AI Prediction Core.

2.name: Short-Term Sentiment Monitor
2.description: Analyzes social media and other sentiment data to gauge short-term market sentiment affecting 0DTE options.

3.name: Volatility Analyzer
3.description: Analyzes current and implied volatility to assess risk and inform option selection for 0DTE trading.

4.name: Market Maker Intent Classifier
4.description: Attempts to predict the actions of market makers by analyzing order flow, volume, and other data points.

5.name: News and Press Release Parser
5.description: Processes news feeds and press releases to extract relevant information for the AI Prediction Core.

6.name: Options Time & Force Decay Calculator
6.description: Calculates the time decay (theta) and other Greeks of options, crucial for 0DTE trading strategies.

7.name: High-Speed Trade Executor
7.description: Executes trades rapidly on multiple exchanges based on signals from the AI Prediction Core and risk parameters.

8.name: Risk Management Module
8.description: Monitors and manages the risk associated with 0DTE options trading, adjusting positions and strategies as needed.

9.name: Market Data Feeds
9.description: Provides real-time and historical market data, including prices, volumes, and other relevant information.

10.name: Order Book Data
10.description: Provides a detailed view of the order book, showing bid and ask prices and quantities at each level.

11.name: News Feeds
11.description: Delivers news articles, headlines, and press releases that may impact the market and specific assets.

12.name: Social Media Feeds
12.description: Provides data from social media platforms, useful for gauging market sentiment and public opinion.

13.name: Alternative Financial Data
13.description: Includes non-traditional data sources that may provide insights into market movements or company performance.

14.name: Exchange Platform 1
14.description: One of the trading venues where the system executes trades, providing access to specific markets or assets.

15.name: Exchange Platform 2
15.description: A second trading venue for trade execution, offering access to different markets or liquidity pools.

16.name: Human Monitoring Interface
16.description: Allows human operators to monitor the system's performance, adjust parameters, and intervene if necessary.

17.name: Performance & Backtesting Analyzer
17.description: Analyzes the system's performance and allows for backtesting of strategies using historical data.
